Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'In the hush of darkness, wrapped in a tranquil yet faintly forlorn reverie.'}
{3: 'Limbs numb, eyes too heavy to open, heart adrift without a home.'}
{3: "Drifting, letting your memories roam deeper, questing until they're adrift."}
{3: 'Space fades, time loses its grip, and even existence feels like an afterthought.'}
{3: 'Amidst the vast void, a distant shore beckons with a haunting melody.'}
{3: "As the notes touch the water's surface, ripples take on a faint glow, weaving dark currents into intricate patterns."}
{3: 'The shapes sculpted are heartbeats, bodies, and breaths.'}
{3: 'The cast shadows are pulsations, fears, and wanderings.'}
{3: 'Layers of reality shift, drawing nearer to the haunting song.'}
{3: 'At last, the melody fades, replaced by a fragile rhythm.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Ready to embark on the journey? Alongside that girl.'}
{3: "Like the somber toll of an ancient clock, time weighs heavily on the dream's edge."}
{2: '???', 3: "You'll edge closer to the truth and pay the price, but not before..."}
{3: 'Memories slowly return from the void, heart pounding fiercely.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Remember the purpose of the journey.'}
{3: 'Distant lights flicker in solitude, your own breath the only sound.'}
{3: "A stranger's voice fades, light emerging in the darkness."}
{2: 'Choose?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiMemoryInformation.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory101.png'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Emerging from slumber, your gaze meets eyes as crimson as a blood moon.'}
{3: 'A peculiar girl stands before you, a mischievous grin playing on her lips.'}
{3: 'The ticking of the clock persists, its echo resonating through the spacious room.'}
{3: "The girl's lips tremble, eyes narrowed in curiosity as she watches you."}
{2: '???', 3: 'What a peculiar rendezvous, awake yet tangled in dreams, huh?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'So, Chosen One, tell me. What did you see on the flip side of this serene land?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The sea, grids, the distant shore...', 3: '42'}
{2: '???', 3: 'All whimsical stuff kids cook up. Still stuck in childhood?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Aren't you also...", 3: '44'}
{2: '???', 3: "Me? I'm no kid! Open your eyes and take a good look.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gestures to the subtle package lines on her shoulder.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Get it? Judging by looks is a bad habit, gotta shake that off!', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Anyway, as a thank-you for sharing your dream, let me introduce myself.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "I'm Jetavie, and for some reason, fate's brought us together here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Well, guess it's all written in the stars.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hello, Jetavie?', 3: '51'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Hello, Chosen One.'}
{3: 'Jetavie, hands tucked behind her back, whips out a can of milk out of nowhere.'}
{3: 'Her expression turns freaky.'}
{2: 'What do you want?', 3: '56'}
{3: 'Jetavie saunters over, shoving a milk bottle in your mouth and pouring milk.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Don't fight it, you're pretty weak right now. More milk is good for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "That's it, keep chugging, it'd be a shame to waste it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gulp—gulp—gulp—', 3: '61'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Hahaha, look at you, like a baby... Not a bad look, though.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jetavie, trying to stifle her giggles, suddenly cracks up, hand flying to cover her mouth.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Impressive, you shake off that weirdness without missing a beat.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'You totally cool with this or just clueless about the danger?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Either way, staying calm like this is a rare trait.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jetavie gives a little curtsy to apologize, showing a whole different level of grace from her earlier rudeness.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Chosen One, get up and scope out your surroundings.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Seriously, you got zero clue what's going on?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Under Jetavie's guidance, your gaze wanders across every nook of the room..."}
{3: "It's a roomy space decked out in light tones, where simplicity and elegance take center stage."}
{3: 'Pale sofas, walls, ceilings, and doors dominate the scene, except for one standout feature...'}
{3: 'A mammoth black clock hanging dead center, way too big for comfort.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Ah, caught it, huh? You saw that clock too, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Silver-haired Jetavie, now at your side, shoots you a concerned glance, her gaze fixed on the ominous clock.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Despite its clash with the room's aesthetic, it's a necessary evil, a constant reminder of the ticking clock.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'A dark clock?', 3: '82'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Not a run-of-the-mill timepiece, just a facade crafted by me.', 4: '1'}
{3: "With a snap of Jetavie's fingers, the rustic clock morphs into a screen flashing red digits."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: "See? Clearer, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'A countdown?', 3: '92'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Precisely, a countdown.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Jetavie talks, those numbers on the screen keep shifting.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: "See, it's as simple as that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'They keep dropping until they hit zero.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'And what happens then?', 3: '102'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "What happens if they hit zero? Well, it's game over for the world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Game over? What does that mean?', 3: '104'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'You seem a bit groggy. "Game over" means exactly what it sounds like—over, no more, nada.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Poof, like a bubble popped with a pin, everything just vanishes into thin air.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Can't wrap your head around it? Picture this: world's gone, you, me, everything, all gone like bubbles.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'No need to tell you that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Or rather, not my place to tell you, and you'll figure it out soon enough.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Like hapless bubbles.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jetavie puts a finger to her lips, miming blowing a bubble.'}
{2: "What's happening out there beyond these walls?", 3: '114'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Chosen One, the world beyond this room isn't the peaceful paradise you might've hoped for.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Even this room's just a brief respite in the eye of the storm of chaos.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "It won't hold up for long, soon crumbling into something unrecognizable.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'This is about as far as my skills go. If we linger...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'This safe haven might just become our tomb.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "So, we've got no choice but to leave, and there's not much time for you to get ready.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "But hey, don't stress too much. No matter what goes down, I've got your back, always.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "That means Jetavie's tagging along to witness every twist and turn of your journey.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're a companion?", 3: '123'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Doesn\'t really matter what I am, but "companion" sounds about right.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Neither foe nor friend, just an observer by your side.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Uncovering the truth of this world before the countdown hits zero, obviously.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "For you, for your past and future selves, it's all the same.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The time on that dark screen keeps ticking down...'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With silver hair and crimson eyes, Jetavie flashes that devilish grin again, extending her hand toward you.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Come on, Chosen One, time to hit the road.', 4: '1'}
{3: "After a beat of hesitation, you grasp Jetavie's hand."}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Ah, that's more like it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "And don't let go too easy from here on out.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a jittery heart, you make your way to that door...'}
